thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 2 of 12
thread.title: SIEGEL, JEFFREY

author: SIEGEL, JEFFREY
title: SIEGEL, JEFFREY
text:
I've been using WholeLatteLove for many years now. I continue to use them and cannot recommend them highly enough. I have bought several Coffee and Espresso machines over the years and have used them for both initial sales and service.
I have called and spoken to techs for issues and the responses have been extremely helpful.
I buy coffee from them regularly as their prices are competitive and I enjoy patronizing their web store.
